snippet: The United Federation of Teachers and New York City have been mired in negotiations regarding a new teacher evaluation system that, if not received by Jan. 17, could jeopardize millions in state aid.
abstract: United Federation of Teachers and New York City continue negotiations regarding a new teacher evaluation system that, if not received by Jan 17, could jeopardize millions in state aid.
lead_paragraph: The United Federation of Teachers and New York City have been mired in negotiations regarding a new teacher evaluation system that, if not received by Jan. 17, could jeopardize millions in state aid.

headline.seo: No Progress on Teacher Evaluations as Blame Goes Around
headline.main: Talks on Teacher Evaluations Disintegrate as Deadline Looms
headline.print_headline: Talks on Teacher Evaluations Disintegrate as Deadline Looms
